oneOf.title: formulaic
oneOf.description: Generates the mob's Damage based on a series of parameters given. The range generated will be a 10% difference from the result of this formula for both min and max damage. Use this for easy calculations and accurate math.

playerLevel.title: playerLevel
playerLevel.description: The level of the player(s) that are expected to fight this mob. This is used to get the player's base HP at their level.

playerDr.title: playerDr
playerDr.description: The amount of DR that the player is expected to have against this type of damage. This has to be a decimal from 0 - 1

oneOf.title: decimal
oneOf.description: The amount that their health is multiplied by. This is a percentage and can go beyond 0 - 1. Plate = 2 (200%), Mail = 1, Leather/Cloth = 0.5

oneOf.title: armor
oneOf.description: The type of armor that the player is expected to wear when fighting this mob. This will automatically calculate their health multiplier based on the type. It's recommended to use this in case the Armor health balancing ever changes. Valid arguments: PLATE, MAIL, CLOTH, LEATHER

damagePerHit.title: damagePerHit
damagePerHit.description: The amount of damage that this mob deals based on the player's MAX HP and DR. This is a decimal from 0 - 1
